name: The AutoVac
description:
The AutoVac

With huge jumps in smart home technology and artificial intelligence, the idea of being outsmarted by a rodent is frankly quite laughable.

CONTROLS

[Keyboard. If the game is unresponsive, trying clicking inside the game window.]

WASD to Move: Tank controls, Up is forward, left and right rotates, etc

SPACE to shoot: once ability is unlocked. Ammo will recharge over time.

HOW TO PLAY

As a simple autonomous vacuum cleaner, your role is to carry out the will of the home, whether its by cleaning up dirt by moving over top of it, or waging a one machine war against a brood of territorial rodents. Sometimes you may have to hunt down rodents as they emerge, or just keep yourself alive for a period of time.

V. 1.1 - minor tweaking of camera and UI
